data.title: Captain Leonard E. Penso Perpetual Award
data.text:
The Captain Leonard E. Penso perpetual trophy is awarded to the man 50 or older who beats the most boats in his class in the Spring Regatta. In the case of a tie, the award is made to the man placing higher in his own fleet.

2016 Barney Harris

2015 Barney Harris

2014 Paul Clifford

2013 Barney Harris

2012 Barney Harris

2011 Nabeel Alsalam

2010 Barney Harris

2009 Khin Thein

2008 Jim Graham

2007 Khin Thein

2006 Khin Thein

2005 Lloyd Leonard

2004 Daphne Byron

2003 Marty Hublitz

2002 Lloyd Leonard

2001 Lloyd Leonard

1999 Rolf Zeisler

1998 Daphne Byron

1997 Daphne Byron

1995 Daphne Byron

1994 Robert Beach

1993 David Wallerstein
